September.body: Feathers in the breeze | Chicken Boy stands tall and proud | Rooster of the streets.
Blueberry delight | Frozen treat on a hot day | Summer's sweetest bite.
Steel giants so high | Reaching for the endless sky | Urban dreams touch stars.
Creatures roam and play | In nature's grand ballet | Wildlife's wondrous display.
Melted cheese so fine | On a doughy crust divine | Pizza love's design.
Pages come alive | Worlds within the written word | Imagination thrives.
Cured and savory | Salami's flavor so bold | Charcuterie gold.
Symbol of connection | Binding words with affection | & is perfection.
Soft and cuddly friend | Teddy bear, love without end | Comfort they extend.
Minds together blend | Ideas shared, new paths to tend | Innovation's trend.
Flags at half-mast sway | In memory we convey | Heroes of that day.
Chocolate swirls in cream | Milkshake, a childhood dream | Sweet delight supreme.
Guidance and embrace | Grandparents' love leaves its trace | Warmth and wisdom's grace.
Colors, forms, and sound | Creativity unbound | Inventive hearts abound.
Felt hat on the head | Vintage style, old-world thread | Fashion finely bred.
Mashed green and bright | Guacamole's pure delight | Dip into the light.
Freedom's cornerstone | Constitution's truth is known | Rights we call our own.
Juicy patty seared | Cheese and toppings, flavors cheered | Burger love revered.

September.day: National Talk Like a Pirate Day
September.body: Arr, matey, they say | Pirates speak in their own way | Seafaring display.
Pepperoni's zest | Pizza's classic, loved the best | Slices of pure fest.
Flags of every hue | Peace for me and peace for you | World's dreams coming true.
Gentle giants roam | In the wild they find their home | Elephants, we own.

September.day: National Great American Pot Pie Day
September.body: Flaky crust conceals | Savory fillings, warm appeals | Pot pie's comfort heals.
Periods, commas, dash | Punctuation's rhythmic flash | Grammar's art, a splash.
Ink and paper dance | Heroes rise, villains advance | Comic worlds entrance.
Golden, fluffy stacks | Syrup rivers down their backs | Morning joy, no lack.
Aluminum's clang | Recycle and reduce's the plan | Earth's future in hand.
Amber liquid gold | Cheers to friends and stories told | Beer's warmth, untold.
Brewed to start the day | Coffee's warmth in every way | Caffeine's rich ballet.
Spices warm and wide | Cider simmered by fireside | Autumn's sip with pride.

October.body: Oven's warm embrace | Cookies baked with love and grace | Sweet smiles they chase.
Brooms and mops in hand | Custodians, we understand | Cleaners of our land.
Circuits and code flow | Techies make the digital show | Innovation's glow.
Greens and fairways wide | Golfers take the scenic ride | Swinging with great pride.
Kindness softly sings | In the littlest of things | Hearts take flight on wings.
Twisted, long or short | Noodles come in every sort | Pasta's hearty fort.
Whirling, icy bliss | Frappe's chill, a sweetened kiss | Sip and reminisce.
Doughy pockets hide | Fillings savory inside | Pierogi, a pride.
Norseman's daring quest | Leif Erikson's sails abreast | New worlds to invest.
Mind's delicate thread | Mental health, a path we tread | Healing love widespread.
Courage to declare | Coming out, love's truth to share | Hearts now free, aware.
Sails upon the sea | Columbus's discovery | A new world set free.
Neurons softly glow | Train your brain, let knowledge flow | Wisdom's light to show.
Sweet indulgence nears | Dessert's joy, a treat that cheers | Blissful taste appears.
Sourness in the air | Grouchy moods beware and spare | Sunshine's warmth to wear.
Bountiful array | World's food, a gift each day | Hunger's night gives way.
Saucy, twirling grace | Pasta's flavors interlace | Italian embrace.
Chocolate's sweet reign | Cupcake joy, no need to feign | Delight in every vein.
Strangers become kin | New friends' bonds, a welcomed win | Hearts begin to spin.
Hold your pants up high | Suspenders reach for the sky | Style in every guy.
Autumn's treat divine | Pumpkin cheesecake, flavors entwine | Harvest's grand design.
Tails wag in delight | Make a dog's day, shine so bright | Love's bond, pure and right.
Creamy layers glide | Boston pie, a cherished ride | Dessert's source of pride.
Nations hand in hand | United under peace's stand | Hope across the land.
Fried and crispy bites | Greasy foods, indulgent nights | Savoring the lights.
Orange globes so grand | Pumpkins wait to be in hand | Carving dreams, unplanned.
Silhouettes of night | Black cats prowl with grace and might | Myths take silent flight.
Cocoa's rich embrace | Chocolate's joy in every place | Sweetness we embrace.
Whiskers soft and fine | Cats, companions so divine | Purring, hearts entwine.
Tri-color delight | Candy corn, a sugary sight | Halloween's sweet bite.
Moon's eerie crescent | Halloween night, spirits present | Masks and fright's ascent.

November.body: Ink on pages flow | Authors' tales, emotions show | Worlds they bestow.
Eggs dressed with delight | Deviled, flavors take their flight | Taste buds ignite.
Layers of delight | Sandwiches, day and night | Fillings taking flight.
Sugary delight | Candy's colors shining bright | Sweets to savor, right.
Round and sweet, they fry | Doughnuts with a sugared sky | Morning's sweet goodbye.

Liberty's grand call | Freedom's dream, a shining thrall | Hearts stand strong, not small.

November.day: National Pizza with the Works Except Anchovies Day
November.body: Pizza's loaded grace | Toppings piled in every space | Anchovies find no place.
Acts of kindness bloom | Hearts and souls, love consumes | Kindness breaks the gloom.
Crunchy, briny treat | Pickles add a zesty beat | Sour and oh so sweet.
Generosity flows | Philanthropy's heart aglow | Giving helps us grow.

Bread and spices blend | Stuffing's savory delight | Thanksgiving's amend.

Ruby jewels so bright | Cranberries, a tangy bite | Flavors take their flight.

Deals and shoppers swarm | Black Friday's early morn | Bargains take their form.

December.body: Red ribbon's embrace | World AIDS Day, hearts we lace | Hope in every place.
Tails wag in delight | Mutts, a mix of day and night | Uniqueness in sight.

December.day: National Roof Over Your Head Day
December.body: Shelter, safe and warm | Roofs above, a cozy charm | Grateful hearts transform.

Peaks reach for the sky | Mountains, majesty up high | Nature's grand supply.
